query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS autoscaling_rules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicationId INT,
  userId INT,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  resourceType ENUM('deployment', 'container', 'pod', 'service') NOT NULL,
  resourcePattern VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  namespace VARCHAR(255),
  metricType ENUM('cpu', 'memory', 'requests', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  scaleUpThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  scaleDownThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  minReplicas INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  maxReplicas INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  cooldownSeconds INT DEFAULT 300 NOT NULL,
  scaleUpStep INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  scaleDownStep INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  isEnabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  requiresApproval BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  aiAssisted BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  lastScaledAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FbHQcBqwdUAeZd.daf6bd01f5d9 --database bVoJhS4CeCN2GuJxoMncsM --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS autoscaling_rules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicationId INT,
  userId INT,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  resourceType ENUM('deployment', 'container', 'pod', 'service') NOT NULL,
  resourcePattern VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  namespace VARCHAR(255),
  metricType ENUM('cpu', 'memory', 'requests', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  scaleUpThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  scaleDownThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  minReplicas INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  maxReplicas INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  cooldownSeconds INT DEFAULT 300 NOT NULL,
  scaleUpStep INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  scaleDownStep INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  isEnabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  requiresApproval BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  aiAssisted BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  lastScaledAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
